outputs.output_descr: UNDP in partnership with the FATA Disaster Management Authority has launched a programme entitled as "Strengthening the Foundation for Recovery, Peace and Development in FATA". The project aims to support the crisis affected communities in FATA to rebuild their lives through early recovery, provision of livelihood opportunities, rehabilitating community infrastructure to bring peace and social cohesion.

project_descr: Strengthening the Foundation for Recovery, Peace and Development in FATA
project_title: Strengthening the Foundation for Recovery P&D in FATA
